Class NotifyExceptionAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.client.ServerAction
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.client.NotifyExceptionAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NotifyExceptionAction extends ServerAction
Action that carries an exception message from the server and injects it into each phase's view data.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
